places.title: Hundred Islands National Park
places.query: Hundred Islands National Park Alaminos Pangasinan
places.note: Classic Pangasinan trip: boats + islands + viewpoints.

places.title: Patar Beach
places.note: Wide shoreline and great sunset photos.

places.title: Cabongaoan Beach (Death Pool)
places.query: Cabongaoan Beach Death Pool Burgos Pangasinan
places.note: Best at low tide; always be cautious near rock pools.

places.title: Tondol Beach
places.note: Known as 'Little Boracay of the North' due to fine white sand.

places.title: Urbiztondo Beach
places.query: Urbiztondo Beach San Juan La Union
places.note: The surfing capital of the north; great food and waves.

places.title: Minalungao National Park
places.note: Famous for limestone walls and bamboo rafting.

places.title: Strawberry Farm
places.note: Pick your own strawberries; best visited in cooler months.

places.title: Anawangin Cove
places.note: Accessible by boat; popular for camping amidst agoho trees.

places.title: Tangadan Falls
places.query: Tangadan Falls San Gabriel La Union
places.note: Requires a trek; features a wide cascade and cliff jumping.

landmarks.title: Minor Basilica of Our Lady of the Rosary of Manaoag
landmarks.query: Minor Basilica of Our Lady of the Rosary of Manaoag Pangasinan
landmarks.note: A well-known church and pilgrimage destination.

landmarks.title: Enchanted Cave
landmarks.note: Short stop with a cave pool—check local guidelines.

landmarks.title: Pangasinan Provincial Capitol
landmarks.note: Grand neo-classical building and a historical landmark.

landmarks.title: BenCab Museum
landmarks.note: Features works by National Artist Ben Cabrera and tribal art.

landmarks.title: Monasterio de Tarlac
landmarks.note: Hilltop monastery housing a relic of the True Cross.

landmarks.title: Ma-Cho Temple
landmarks.note: A scenic Taoist temple overlooking the sea.

landmarks.title: Capas National Shrine
landmarks.note: Memorial dedicated to soldiers of the Bataan Death March.

stays.title: The Monarch Hotel
stays.note: A popular option for comfort stays in the area.

stays.title: Puerto Del Sol Beach Resort
stays.query: Puerto Del Sol Beach Resort Bolinao Pangasinan
stays.note: Beach resort vibes—good for a chill overnight.

stays.title: Dagupan City Hotels
stays.note: Convenient base if you want a city + food stop.

stays.title: Alaminos City Hotels
stays.note: Great if you’re doing Hundred Islands early the next day.

stays.title: Thunderbird Resorts - Poro Point
stays.query: Thunderbird Resorts Poro Point La Union
stays.note: Santorini-inspired luxury resort with casino and golf.

stays.title: The Manor at Camp John Hay
stays.query: The Manor at Camp John Hay Baguio
stays.note: Iconic Baguio hotel surrounded by pine trees.

stays.title: Flotsam & Jetsam Artist Beach Hostel
stays.note: Trendy, social spot popular with surfers and youth.

stays.title: Crystal Beach Resort
stays.note: Famous for agoho trees and beachfront camping options.

stays.title: Birdland Beach Club
stays.note: Eco-boutique resort known for unique structures and views.
